BBEX3.A.MMK.EUR.CA.AB.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Myanmar / EUR 1 = MMK ... (selling)

General: * Until March 2012, in addition to the official published rates, there were other rates which deviated substantially from the official rates; however, we do not have any details. At the beginning of April 2012, a managed floating exchange rate regime was introduced; since then, indicative rates have been published. Rates from 2012, see BBEX2:A:MMK:EUR:CA:AC:A04.
Source: Central Bank of Myanmar, Nay Pyi Taw (until October 2009: Yangon)
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.
